content: --- title: Baggage Data Models description: published: true date: 2025-07-25T08:28:20.781Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T10:39:24.261Z --- # Baggage Info Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | baggageId | `'string'` | Baggage identifier | | pnr | `'string'` | PNR number of the baggage | | flightLegId | `'string'` | Flight leg identifier | | carrier | `'string'` | Carrier code, TK, XQ etc. | | flightNumber | `'string'` | Flight number | | udor | `'date'` | Date of origination in UTC | | inboundLegId | `'string'` | Inbound leg information | | outboundLegId | `'string'` | Outbound leg information | | status | `'string'` | Status of the baggage e.g. Loaded | | reason | `'string'` | Reason for not loaded baggage | | weight | `'number'` | Weight in KGs | | isExcess | `'boolean'` | Y or N | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Baggage Statistics Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | flightLegId | `'string'` | Flight leg identifier | | udor | `'date'` | Date of origination in UTC | | carrier | `'string'` | Carrier code, TK, XQ etc. | | flightNumber | `'string'` | Flight number | | regId | `'string'` | Aircraft identifier | | aircraftType | `'string'` | Aircraft type | | numberOfTotalBaggage | `'number'` | Number of baggages | | totalBaggageWeight | `'number'` | Total weight in KGs | | bookedTotalCargoWeight | `'number'` | Total cargo weight booked (in kilograms)| | actualTotalCargoWeight | `'number'` | Total cargo weight flown (in kilograms)| | numberOfExcessBaggage | `'number'` | Number of excess baggage | | totalExcessBaggageWeight | `'number'` | Weight in excess baggage KGs | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information |
fm:title: Baggage Data Models description: published: true date: 2025-07-25T08:28:20.781Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T10:39:24.261Z
